author: Steve Clemons
title: The Hill's Coronavirus Report: Wenstrup rips China and WHO; Congress seeks to pass new aid bill this week
description: White House, governors at odds on reopening plans |  Dems, GOP inch closer to small-business loans package | President commits to ramping up testing kits | Demonstrators flood state capitals in protest of stay-at-home orders | Impact of crisis on economy coll…
content:
